description: Pisot sequence E(4,19), a(n) = floor( a(n-1)^2/a(n-2)+1/2 ).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
D. W. Boyd, Some integer sequences related to the Pisot sequences, Acta Arithmetica, 34 (1979), 295-305
D. W. Boyd, Linear recurrence relations for some generalized Pisot sequences, Advances in Number Theory ( Kingston ON, 1991) 333-340, Oxford Sci. Publ., Oxford Univ. Press, New York, 1993.
mathematica: PSE[a_,b_,n_]:=Join[{x=a,y=b}, Table[z=Floor[y^2/x+1/2]; x=y; y=z, {n}]]; A010907=PSE[4,19,20] (* _Zak Seidov_, Mar 24 2011 *)nxt[{a_,b_}]:={b,Floor[b^2/a+1/2]}; Transpose[NestList[nxt,{4,19},20]] [[1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 13 2016 *)
author: _Simon Plouffe_
